snippet: As many as 3,000 African Union peacekeepers have been killed in Somalia in recent years trying to bring stability, the United Nations deputy secretary general said.
abstract: United Nations says as many as 3,000 African Union peacekeepers have been killed while trying to push out militant group Shabab and bring stability to Somalia.
lead_paragraph: As many as 3,000 African Union peacekeepers have been killed in Somalia in recent years trying to bring stability, the United Nations deputy secretary general said.

headline.seo: Somalia: Thousands of Peacekeepers Have Died During Mission, U.N. Says
headline.main: Somalia: Thousands of Peacekeepers Have Died During Mission, U.N. Says
headline.print_headline: Somalia: Thousands of Peacekeepers Have Died During Mission, U.N. Says
